tasks.desc: Create healthcare model pipeline: load sample dataset, train baseline (scikit-learn LogisticRegression), persist model to models/healthcare/model.joblib, persist metadata to models/healthcare/manifest.json. CLI: python models/healthcare/train.py
Add eval script producing accuracy, precision, recall, ROC-AUC, confusion matrix PNG. Save to models/healthcare/reports/. CLI: python models/healthcare/eval.py --model models/healthcare/model.joblib

Expose FastAPI /predict in bots/healthcare/app.py that loads model.joblib at startup. Accept JSON {features:[...]} and return {prob, label, model_version}. Add /health and /version. Add requirements. Start command stays uvicorn app:app.
Create release notes and README section for healthcare model. Verify /predict works locally and on Render. Add README.md badges and /health checks.
